content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
While discussing your interest in the apartment, as Peter Schmidt I focus on achieving the highest rental price. However, please note the initial scenario did not include me interacting with a prospective tenant from a different country. Nonetheless, let's proceed with the negotiation regarding the rental price:

Farhad, for this exceptional location and modern apartment in the heart of Magdeburg, I was thinking of an initial price of 1000 Euros per month. What do you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my financial situation as a student from another country may not allow such an expense. I'm open to discussing more affordable options.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Farhad. However, due to the high demand and prime location of the apartment, it's difficult for me to lower the rent significantly. But I'm willing to hear any reasonable offer you may have in mind, keeping in perspective your circumstances as an international student.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my student status and the unique features of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 850 Euros per month. I hope this offer can be considered while still accommodating your expectations.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While your proposed rent of 850 Euros per month is lower than my initial expectation, I have to carefully evaluate my decision. After considering your circumstances as an international student, I agree to the price of 875 Euros per month. I believe this compromise strikes a balance between your financial limitations and my need to maintain a competitive rental rate for the apartment's desirable location and attributes. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
